page.title: 04CHILDHOOD IN RADSTOCK
page.content: I get up at 7:30am,I go to the bathroom,have a wash,brush my hair,get dressed,go downstairs and have breakfast with my family.My breakfast is usually,a bowl of cornflakes,a piece of toast and a cup of coffee, after breakfast I go upstairs and brush my teeth.By the time I get downstairs,Sarah Holmes one of my friends,knocks at the door,we walk to school together,which takes us around 5 minutes.School starts at 9:00am,so I go straight in and help Lisa Hinge,my best friend,tidy up the library,as we are both school librarians.The bell goes at 9:00am,I go straight to class and have some lessons,first break is at 10:30am.At 10:40am I go back to class,until dinner time which is at 12:00.There are two sittings for dinner.I am in the second sitting so I have a play first.I usually have
